description:
SctpProfile:  A table containing parameters for Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP) profiles used in a 5G/4G RAN.

- dateTime: Timestamp indicating when the SCTP profile parameters were recorded.
- Area_Name: Geographical area where the SCTP profile is applied (e.g., cell site location).
- CellId: Unique identifier of the cell site.
- Id2: Redundant Cell ID, likely a duplicate of CellId.
- Id3: Additional identifier potentially indicating a specific node or configuration within the cell.
- vsDataType: Data type identifier indicating this record as SCTP profile data.
- vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the SCTP profile data format.
- SctpProfile.minRto: Minimum retransmission timeout (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.maxInStreams: Maximum number of incoming SCTP streams.
- SctpProfile.initARWnd: Initial Advertised Receive Window size.
- SctpProfile.userLabel: User-defined label for the SCTP profile.
- SctpProfile.maxInitRt: Maximum initial retransmission attempts.
- SctpProfile.primaryPathAvoidance: Flag indicating whether primary path avoidance is enabled.
- SctpProfile.bundlingTimer: Timer for SCTP bundling.
- SctpProfile.cookieLife: Lifetime of the SCTP cookie (in seconds).
- SctpProfile.dscp: Differentiated Services Code Point value for SCTP traffic.
- SctpProfile.transmitBufferSize: Transmit buffer size (in bytes).
- SctpProfile.thrTransmitBufferCongCeased: Congestion ceased threshold for the transmit buffer.
- SctpProfile.minActivateThr: Minimum activation threshold.
- SctpProfile.incCookieLife: Increment for cookie lifetime.
- SctpProfile.betaIndex: Beta index for congestion control.
- SctpProfile.maxOutStreams: Maximum number of outgoing SCTP streams.
- SctpProfile.initRto: Initial retransmission timeout (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.thrTransmitBuffer: Threshold for transmit buffer.
- SctpProfile.noSwitchback: Flag indicating whether switchback is disabled.
- SctpProfile.heartbeatInterval: Interval between heartbeats (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.initialHeartbeatInterval: Initial interval between heartbeats (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.maxActivateThr: Maximum activation threshold.
- SctpProfile.maxShutdownRt: Maximum shutdown retransmission attempts.
- SctpProfile.bundlingActivated: Flag indicating whether bundling is enabled.
- SctpProfile.pathMaxRtx: Maximum retransmissions per path.
- SctpProfile.bundlingAdaptiveActivated: Flag indicating whether adaptive bundling is enabled.
- SctpProfile.assocMaxRtx: Maximum retransmissions per association.
- SctpProfile.heartbeatActivated: Flag indicating whether heartbeats are enabled.
- SctpProfile.maxRto: Maximum retransmission timeout (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.maxBurst: Maximum burst size.
- SctpProfile.alphaIndex: Alpha index for congestion control.
- SctpProfile.maxSctpPduSize: Maximum SCTP Protocol Data Unit size (in bytes).
- SctpProfile.hbMaxBurst: Maximum burst size for heartbeats.
- SctpProfile.primaryPathMaxRtx: Maximum retransmissions for the primary path.
- SctpProfile.sctpProfileId: Unique identifier for the SCTP profile.
- SctpProfile.sackTimer: Selective Acknowledgement (SACK) timer (in milliseconds).
- SctpProfile.reservedBy:  Information indicating which entity (e.g., node, subnetwork) reserved the profile.
